Audio

Class ByteToFloat

  • java.lang.Object
    • Audio.ByteToFloat

  • public class ByteToFloat
extends java.lang.Object
    Class converts an byte array to a float array and vice versa. Used for greater accuracy in audio processing.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ByteToFloat() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float[] byteToFloatArray(byte[] byteArray, int maxValue)
      Convert byte array of audio into array of floats for processing such as volume control.
      byte[] floatToByteArray(float[] floatArray, int minValue, int maxValue)
      Convert float array back to byte array.
      int getMaxValue()
      Get max representable value.
      int getMinValue()
      Get min representable value.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • byteToFloatArray

        public float[] byteToFloatArray(byte[] byteArray,
                                int maxValue)
        Convert byte array of audio into array of floats for processing such as volume control.
        Parameters:
        byteArray - - audio array
        maxValue - - Maximum signed value
        Returns:
        - Float array float[]

      • floatToByteArray

        public byte[] floatToByteArray(float[] floatArray,
                               int minValue,
                               int maxValue)
        Convert float array back to byte array. New byte array will be post-audio-processing.
        Parameters:
        floatArray - - array to convert back
        minValue - - Minimum signed value
        maxValue - - Maximum signed value
        Returns:
